segments.text: Can we sit on the grass , darling ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you can't , darling . The grass is wet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look , darling ! I can see a bench near that tree .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you can't . The bench is wet , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not raining , darling . The bench isn't wet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can't you see a notice on the bench ?
segments.speaker: S2
